ingredients.@value: coarse salt and fresh black pepper
1 + 1/3 cups shredded monterey jack or cheddar cheese

name.@value: Monterey Chicken w/ Barbecue Sauce, Bacon and Cheese

recipeInstructions.@value: An hour or two before cooking pound out the chicken breasts between two pieces of plastic wrap using a meat mallet or a skillet to an even thickness. Season with salt and pepper and place in a large bowl - cover with barbecue sauce and marinate in the refrigerator.
